import React from "react" import Card from "./subcomponents/cards.js" import "../assets/style/producto.scss" import Catalogo from "./catalogo" import aguacate from "../assets/static/frutas/aguacate.jpg" import cereza from "../assets/static/frutas/cereza.jpeg" import choclo from "../assets/static/frutas/choclo.jpeg" import coco from "../assets/static/frutas/coco.jpeg" import duraznoAmarillo from "../assets/static/frutas/durazno amarillo.jpeg" import duraznoRojo from "../assets/static/frutas/durazno rojo.jpeg" import frutilla from "../assets/static/frutas/frutilla.jpeg" import guineo from "../assets/static/frutas/guineo.jpeg" import kiwi from "../assets/static/frutas/kiwi.jpeg" import limon from "../assets/static/frutas/limon.jpeg" import mandarina from "../assets/static/frutas/mandarina.jpeg" import mango from "../assets/static/frutas/mango.jpeg" import manzana from "../assets/static/frutas/manzana.jpeg" import melon from "../assets/static/frutas/melon.jpeg" import mora from "../assets/static/frutas/mora.jpeg" import naranja from "../assets/static/frutas/naranja.jpeg" import papaya from "../assets/static/frutas/papaya.jpeg" import pera from "../assets/static/frutas/pera.jpeg" import piña from "../assets/static/frutas/piña.jpeg" import sandia from "../assets/static/frutas/sandia.jpeg" import uva from "../assets/static/frutas/uva.jpeg" class Frutas extends React.Component{ constructor (props){ super(props) this.state = { frutas: [], isFetch: true, } } componentDidMount (){ fetch("https://sheetdb.io/api/v1/lkcv6h24qpzi4") .then(response => response.json()) .then(frutasJson => this.setState({ frutas: frutasJson, isFetch: false})) } render(){ if ( this.state.isFetch){ return "loading..." } const nombrefruta = this.state.frutas[0].nombre const imagenfruta = this.state.frutas[0].src const comprafruta = this.state.frutas[0].metodo_de_compra const preciofruta = this.state.frutas[0].precio return (

FRUTAS

) } } export default Frutas
